Class Sandstone

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      info.gridworld.actor.Rock
          Sandstone

public class Sandstone
extends info.gridworld.actor.Rock

Sandstone is a type of rock that erodes over time and then eventually disappears from the grid altogether.

Version:
September 26, 2016
Author:
Alex Yu

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_DECOMPOSING_FACTOR
          The default amount that Sandstone gets lighter
static int RGB_MAX
          The maximum amount of rgb value the color that the Sandstone can reach
 
Constructor Summary
Sandstone()
          Constructs Sandstone with the default black color and default decomposing factor.
Sandstone(Color color)
          Constructs Sandstone with given color and default decomposing factor.
Sandstone(Color color, int decompose)
          Constructs Sandstone with given color and given decomposing factor.
Sandstone(int decompose)
          Constructs Sandstone with the default black color and given decomposing factor.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Oversees the decomposing and then removes itself from grid after it turns completely white.
 void lighten()
          Becomes lighter and lighter until completely white.
